//bank = 8, row = 13, column = 10
//32位带宽

//去掉DQS差分；
//DDR2端的ODT为150ohm；
//打开ak端的ODT；
//SSTL驱动能力为30mA；
//驱动能力full；
//在“AK9805_DDR2_SAMSUNG_K4T1G164QE_128MB_32位_Open_ODT.txt”基础上进行修改，按照20110617操东华的邮件修改
//“测试ddr2缩减功耗的设置，是在初始化ddr2的参数的时候，将0x2000e078[25：24]两个bit位，均设置为1，就可以了”

[CONFIG_DATA]
0x66668888, 0x00010100,
0x08000004, 0x00005015,
0x20026000, 0x30600479,
0x66668888, 0x00010100,
0x2000e004, 0x00ae5a20,
0x2000e008, 0x0014f7ff,
0x2000e05c, 0x00000200,
0x2000e078, 0x433cc060,
0x08000064, 0x08000000,
0x2000e004, 0x00261111,
0x2000e008, 0x00143252,
0x2000e000, 0x00004e90,
0x66668888, 0x00000100,
0x2000e010, 0x02000000,
0x2000e010, 0x0af00000,
0x2000e010, 0x0aa00400,
0x2000e010, 0x0a820000,
0x2000e010, 0x0a830000,
0x2000e010, 0x0a810440,
0x2000e010, 0x0a800332,
0x2000e010, 0x0aa00400,
0x2000e010, 0x0ac00000,
0x2000e010, 0x0ac00000,
0x2000e010, 0x0a800232,
0x66668888, 0x00000100,
0x2000e010, 0x0af00000,
0x2000e00c, 0x000007d1,
0x2000e020, 0x00000003,
0x2000e024, 0x00000001,
0x66668888, 0x00010100,
0x88888888, 0x00000000,
[END]
